About Vardan

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color="#fe4943" divider_weight="5px" _builder_version="4.16" max_width="120px" global_colors_info="{}"][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.19.0" text_font="Lato||||||||" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="2em" link_font="||||||||" link_text_color="#fe4943" background_layout="dark" min_height="84px" custom_padding="||0px|||" global_colors_info="{}"]

We specialize in Shorthand and Typing Test Preparation for High Court, SSS Board and Other Departmental Tests.  Our unique coaching technique has enabled several students to gain high positions in various Govt. Departments.

We also prepare students for Skills Test and General Test.

Our highly skilled IELTS Teachers with 8+ bands prepare students to join Universities in Canada, Australia and New Zealand.  We provide Study Abroad Consulatation for US, Canada, Australia & New Zealand.

Testimonials

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4" _builder_version="4.19.1" _module_preset="default" global_colors_info="{}"][et_pb_column type="1_4" _builder_version="4.19.1" _module_preset="default" global_colors_info="{}"][et_pb_testimonial author="Gurleen Kaur" portrait_url="data:image/svg+xml;base64," _builder_version="4.19.1" _module_preset="default" global_colors_info="{}"]

Best Institute for typing and steno in Tricity. I am so thankful to Balbir sir as because of his guidance I got the govt job in Punjab sector. Chandigarh. I recommend this institute to all govt job aspirants.

[/et_pb_testimonial][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_4" _builder_version="4.19.1" _module_preset="default" global_colors_info="{}"][et_pb_testimonial author="Nidhi Sharma" portrait_url="data:image/svg+xml;base64," _builder_version="4.19.1" _module_preset="default" global_colors_info="{}"]

Vardan institute is the best coaching centre for learning shorthand. The teaching method of Balbir sir is excellent. He is very experienced. I have learnt great tips in 2 months in this institute that I have never learnt in 7 months from Career Education Institute in Mohali phase 11. I am really grateful to you sir.

[/et_pb_testimonial][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_4" _builder_version="4.19.1" _module_preset="default" global_colors_info="{}"][et_pb_testimonial author="Chitaranjan Kumar" portrait_url="data:image/svg+xml;base64," _builder_version="4.19.1" _module_preset="default" global_colors_info="{}"]

I am very fortunate that I learned stenography from Vardhan Shorthand Coaching institute, under the guidance of Balbir sir. Now, I am working as Personal Assistant to Judge in High Court of M.P. I have also been selected as Stenographer in National Green Tribunal, New Delhi and have also qualified the test of Sr. Scale Stenographer in Punjab & Haryana High Court, Chandigarh. All credit goes to best teaching methods of Balbir Sir.

[/et_pb_testimonial][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_4" _builder_version="4.19.1" _module_preset="default" global_colors_info="{}"][et_pb_testimonial author="Gurpreet Singh" portrait_url="data:image/svg+xml;base64," _builder_version="4.19.1" _module_preset="default" global_colors_info="{}"]

Vardan Institute has been quite famous for helping students in realising their dreams of getting an excellent career. A phenomenal centre for excellent coaching,the students have been delivering astonishing results in stenography exams and are getting placed in various govt. sectors. Am now on the way of completing this course and this is all because of my respected Sir Mr Balbir Singh, big thanks.
